LocationPopup.Title: Fishing
LocationPopup.description: The sea is calm and the breeze is light-perfect fishing conditions.

LocationPopup.Title: Cooking
LocationPopup.description: You'll find a serviceable stove and basic kitchen equipment. It has everything you need to cook comfortably, though it's not luxurious.

LocationPopup.Title: Cooking
LocationPopup.description: It's working, but it could probably run more smoothly. Perhaps it just needs a slight adjustment?

LocationPopup.Title: Reading
LocationPopup.description: This place may not be much, but it's cozy enough to settle in with a book. After all, there's no better companion than a good book to fill the quiet hours.
